archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0741
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As customer, when I am checking on the progress of an order, and there is an option to contact someone at Vodafone for help, I want to be able to click on a link that starts a Chat with, or generates an email to the rifght person, so that I don't have to search for someone to speak with.

properties.value: integration with chat needed; is it Amazon Connect for both chat and email? To be discussed on dedicated workshop

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
